channel.title: Training the Next System Administrator and Web Developer on Superdanby
channel.description: Recent content in Training the Next System Administrator and Web Developer on Superdanby

item.title: Training the Next System Administrator and Web Developer
item.description: About This series is a record of me training my successor as both the system administrator and web developer of National Chung Cheng Univeristy General Affairs. The content inside will not be rich due to the limited time I have. However, many important keywords will be brought up. So, you can just Google them to learn more. Environment Operating System: Fedora Workstation Website Framework: Laravel Queue Public Private Key Revisit rfc4252#section-7 brew The missing package management system for macOS.

item.title: [SAWD]2018 March 23rd
item.description: Linux File System /: file system root /bin: system binaries, will be used when booting up, should be on the same partition of / /dev: devices, should be on the same partition of / /etc: system settings, should be on the same partition of / /lib: system libraries, should be on the same partition of / /sbin: privileged system libraries, should be on the same partition of / /usr: unix specific resources /usr/bin: system binaries not used on boot /usr/sbin: system privileged binaries not used on boot /usr/local/bin: user installed binaries /usr/local/sbin: user installed privileged binaries /var: highly variable data, e.

item.title: [SAWD]2018 March 18th
item.description: Atom A hackable text editor for the 21st century. Linux Usage Bash settings .bashrc .bash_profile Linux command argument conventions: shortened: -alias, can stick together without a new - full: --full name Manual man info vim vi improved

item.title: [SAWD]2018 March 16th
item.description: Computer Fundamentals Core Elements Central Processing Unit: Control Unit Arithmetic Logic Unit Memory Management Unit Registers Memory Input/Output Storage CPU Architecture RISC / CISC: ARM, IBM PowerPC / Intel, AMD Bits: 32 -> 64 Metric Prefix e.g. GiB vs GB Clock Rates How many clock cycles in 1 second. - CPU > Memory Memory SRAM vs DRAM Memory Comparison Storage Speed Volume Register Fastest Smallest L1 Cache 2 4 L2 Cache 3 3 L3 Cache 4 2 Main Memory Slowest Largest Storage HDD vs SSD Interfaces USB Thunderbolt PCIe Storage Partition Master Boot Record1

item.title: [SAWD]2018 March 11th
item.description: sshfs -o reconnect,ServerAliveInterval=5,ServerAliveCountMax=3 Mac requires osxfuse and the option, defer_permissions1, to work correctly. Basic Laravel File Structure routes/web.php: routing control resources/views: blade template system(section, yield, include) public: stores contents that is accessible by anyone. storage: stores to-be-managed contents. .env: basic environment settings php artisan down/up: website accessibility. osxfuse defer_permissions â†©

item.title: [SAWD]2018 March 4th
item.description: Remote Connection with SSH sshusername@hostaddress git: git config --global user.name "USERNAME" git config --global user.email "EMAIL" ssh setup for Github ssh-keygen sshd: public private Key setup, disabling password authentication .ssh permissions: 700 .ssh/authorized_keys permissions: 644
